thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Upscale Marriott with at touch of "je ne sais quoi".
thread.title_full: Upscale Marriott with at touch of "je ne sais quoi". - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Patrice_Kanata
title: Upscale Marriott with at touch of "je ne sais quoi".
text:
The staff was friendly and very helpful.
I liked the setup of the room; modern, practical it was very comfortable to sleep in and for late night work at the desk.
The bar in the atrium is very well suited for casual get together with friends or coworkers.
The internet was not free, but very reliable.
The gym had everything I needed.
I would definitely return.
